summary: Two 12-year-olds, the products of Upper West Side broken homes, struggle to make sense of their parents lives and their own adolescent feelings.
cast: Trini Alvarado|Jeremy Levy|Kathryn Walker|John Lithgow|Terry Kiser|David Selby|Roberta Maxwell|Paul Dooley|Irene Worth|Diane Stilwell|Dianne Kirksey|Olympia Dukakis|Jill Eikenberry|Kathryn Grody|Beatrice Winde|Jack Hausman|Stacy Peppell|Lacey Neuhaus|Patti Hansen|Michael J. Miller|Shag Starbird the Dog|Bruno DiGiorgi
